content: **description ** you ll hang this set of six enchanting ornaments on your tree with pride display each stitch by crocheting them in white to cover a solid-colored glass ornament **size ** fits 2 5 diameter glass ornament **yarn ** 1 ball size 10 cotton crochet thread **hook ** size 6 steel hook gauge is given only as work evenly and consistently free-crochet 1 1 https //www free-crochet com/seasonal_crochet/winter_crochet_patterns/elegant_ornaments/
